messages.title: Best for Brighton
messages.content: Purna Sen, your Labour Parliamentary Candidate 'I am sad and angry when my neighbours in Brighton Pavilion tell me they are struggling with household bills. I meet people doing their best to cope with rising costs and who worry about the future for their children. They don't want the useless austerity economics; Labour government will make practical actions by recovering Protest matters but the leaflet does not make clear, energy costs, and bills, limit profiteers and zero-hours contracts, help with reliable and secure tenancies, and providing our low-paid economy. As your MP I'll always do my best for Brighton.'

keyPolicies.policyDescription: To protect and improve our NHS and the public services we all need.
To fund much needed affordable housing and for a better deal for private tenants.
To combat low pay and make Brighton and Hove a real Living Wage City.
To fight for dignity, decency, fairness and safety for all; including better opportunities for our young people.
To protect our local and global environment for future generations.

issues.economy: Labour government will make practical actions by recovering
issues.environment: To protect our local and global environment for future generations.
issues.health: To protect and improve our NHS
issues.socialWelfare: To protect and improve our NHS and the public services we all need.

images.caption: Vote Best for Brighton Purna Sen Labour Parliamentary Candidate
